QuestData.Title: Toothsmash the Annihilator
QuestData.Description: If the battleplans you brought back are true, the Dreadmaul ogres are as much to blame for this devastation as the Iron Horde. It's time we send those ogres a message.$b$bIt looks like the Iron Horde's main contact is a large ogre in Dreadmaul named Toothsmash. Killing him will put a dent in their battleplans.
QuestData.RewardText: Toothsmash is dead? Good, I'm sure it will take the Iron Horde a while to find another ogre smart enough to help them with their efforts.
